channel.title: Help Me Please, Reward For Helping. (Simple Problem)
channel.description:
The System Cannot find the path specified, and it doesnt save my npcs or what i want them to say and i cant run my server on the complier its just the run.server it runs on some people have been telling me u run it on complier so im not sure so can any plz help me out, oh yeh it doesnt eve nsave if i turn peopel into admin, mod ect.. REWARD: CO-owner of my server thx & Some Hosting ;)
